definition[0]: the sailor in charge of a ship, or the pilot in charge of an aircraft
example[0]: The captain and crew welcome you aboard.
definition[1]: a military officer with a fairly high rank
definition[2]: someone who leads a team or other group of people
example[1]: The Blackhawks' team captain was the first to score.
example[2]: Julieâ€™s captain of the quiz team.
definition[3]: to lead a group or team of people and be their captain
example[3]: The U.S. team, captained by Arthur Ashe, won the Davis Cup in 1981 and 1982.
definition[4]: to be in charge of a ship, aircraft etc
